title: Documents in LiLa
description: Gets all documents in LiLa knowledge base

title: Lexical resources in LiLa
description: Gets all lexical resources in LiLa knowledge base

title: Affixes-Noun
description: Counts the frequency of affixes (both prefixes and suffixes) attached to nouns in the LiLa Knowledge Base and sorts them from the most to the least frequent

title: Corpora
description: Lists all the corpora currently available in the LiLa Knowledge Base

title: Lewis & Short Dictionary
description: Occurrences of words whose LS definition contains "religion" in (a) "Confessiones" (Augustine) and (b) Latin works of Dante Alighieri

title: Lewis & Short Dictionary - Lemmas with "grow"
description: Searches for all lemmas in LiLa LemmaBank whose definition in the LS dictionary includes the word "grow".

title: Velez's Dictionary - lemmas with the base "dico"
description: Searches for entries in the Velez's dictionary whose lemmas have the lexical base "dico".

title: Velez's Dictionary - definitions with "mulher" (woman)
description: Searches for all lemmas in LiLa LemmaBank whose definition in the Velez's dictionary includes the word "mulher" (woman).

title: Velez's Dictionary - simple query
description: Searches for entries in the Velez's dictionary whose lemmas have a certain written representation (e.g. "sero").

title: Velez's Dictionary - verbal lemmas in Catullus
description: Searches for the occurrences of verbs in the Catullus' Liber that have entries in the Velez's dictionary.

title: Lexicon Bohemorum - Lemmas with "natura" not found in Lewis & Short
description: Retrieves all lemmas whose entries in Lexicon Bohemorum include the word "natura" in their definition and do not occur also in the Lewis & Short dictionary, and then returns the number of their occurrences in the textual corpora linked to LiLa.

title: PrinParLat - Perfect forms of prefixed verbs from "pono"
description: Extracts all the perfect forms of all verbs that are directly derived from "pono" via prefixation according to WFL

title: PrinParLat - Lemmas inflected like "laedo" in LASLA
description: Extracts the lemmas of LASLA that are assigned a specific inflection class in PrinParLat (e.g. the one of "laedo": "laedere", "laesi", "laesum")

title: PrinParLat - Lemmas per inflection class in LASLA (3rd conj.)
description: Counts the number of distinct lemmas in LASLA for each inflection micro-class of verbs of the third conjugation

title: Dante Latin Loanwords
description: Counts in the Latin works of Dante Alighieri the number of occurrences of those Latin words that are etyma of Latin loanwords in the Italian works of Dante Alighieri (provided by the "Dante Latin Loanwords" lexical resource).

title: LASLA - Distinctive lemmas Catullus
description: Find all the lemmas that are used only by Catullus

title: LASLA - "Dico" and "Facio" in De Vulgari Eloquentia and Seneca's "De Otio"
description: Counts the occurrences of forms of the lemmas 'dico' and 'facio' in Dante's "De Vulgari Eloquentia" and Seneca's "De Otio".

title: LASLA - Gets all documents in LASLA corpus
description: Lists all the texts in the LASLA corpus

title: LASLA - Negative lemmas in LASLA
description: List of negative lemmas in the LASLA corpus

title: LASLA - Base "patior" in ITTB, UDante and Seneca
description: Given a lexical base (patior), find all the lemmas of that lexical base in Dante, ITTB and Seneca

title: CLaSSES - Tokens with affix "-ad"
description: Lists all the tokens of the various documents of the CLaSSES corpus that belong to a lemma featuring a specific affix in its derivational history (in the example: prefix n. 5 "ad-")

title: CLaSSES - Lemmas with affix
description: Lists the lemmas in the CLaSSES corpus that feature an affix (either prefix, or suffix) in their derivational history and reports the number of their occurrences therein

title: CLaSSES - Count tokens with affix
description: Counts the number of occurrences of words in the CLaSSES corpus that belong to a lemma featuring an affix (either prefix, or suffix) in its derivational history

title: CLaSSES - Count lemmas in CLaSSES and Caesar's "De bello gallico"
description: Lists the lemmas with at least one occurrence both in the CLaSSES corpus and in Caesar's "De bello gallico" (from the LASLA corpus) and reports the number of their occurrences in the two corpora concerned.

title: ITTB - Singular indicative forms from bases
description: Searches for the occurrences of singular indicative forms of lemmas that belong to the lexical base of either "duco"  or "eo"

title: ITTB - Conflictual objects
description: Chains in the ITTB where a common or proper noun depends as Obj in the PDT formalism and as obj in the UD formalism, on a verb belonging to either synset of "minimize, derogate, belittle, denigrate " or "fight, fight down, oppose, fight back, defend", and is head of an adjective (in the LemmaBank) with positive polarity.

title: UDante - Distinctive lemmas De Vulgari Eloquentia
description: Find all the lemmas that are used by Dante only in the "De Vulgari Eloquentia" and not in his other works

title: UDante - "Dico" and "Facio" in De Vulgari Eloquentia
description: Counts the occurrences of each form of the lemmas 'dico' and 'facio' in the work "De Vulgari Eloquentia" of Dante Alighieri;

title: Fibonacci - Distinctive lemmas Fibonacci
description: Finds all the lemmas that are used only by Fibonacci, thus are not present in the other corpora currently linked in the LiLa KB

title: Etymological dictionary De Vaan - Proto-Italic lemmas
description: Retrieves all lemmas with a Proto-Italic reconstructed form

title: Greek etymology in "Querolus sive Aulularia"
description: Retrieves all lemmas of the "Querolus sive Aulularia" corpus with a Greek etymology (and thus included in the "Index Graecorum Vocabulorum in Linguam Latinam") and having the suffixes "-or" and "-ic"

title: Index Graecorum Vocabulorum in Linguam Latinam Translatorum
description: Retrieves all the lemmas with a Greek etymology (and thus included in the "Index Graecorum Vocabulorum in Linguam Latinam"

title: Latin Wordnet
description: Retrieves all the lemmas belonging to a specific synset

title: LemmaBank - Lemmas with specific pos/gender
description: Counts the lemmas in the LiLa Knowledge Base having a specific Part-of-Speech (e.g., NOUN) and a specific gender (e.g., neuter)

title: LemmaBank - Lemmas with specific pos/suffix
description: Retrieves the lemmas in the Lemma Bank with a specific Part-of-Speech (e.g., NOUN) and a suffix

title: LemmaBank - Lemmas with POS
description: Retrieves the lemmas in the Lemma Bank with a specific Part-of-Speech (e.g., NOUN) and a suffix

title: Proto-Italic lemmas in the "Monarchia"
description: Retrieves all the lemmas with a Proto-Italic reconstructed form in the "Monarchia" of Dante Alighieri

title: LatinAffectus - Paragraph sentiment analysis in Dante
description: Performs lexicon-based sentiment analysis on each paragraph of the letters written by Dante Alighieri using LatinAffectus v2

title: LatinAffectus - Textual sentiment analysis in Dante
description: Performs lexicon-based sentiment analysis on each text of the Epistole by Dante Alighieri using LatinAffectus v2

title: Latin Wordnet - Forms of a synset
description: Finds the forms that have a specific synset in the currently revised portion of Latin WordNet (e.g. 00179311-v: "take out, take away") and a valency frame with specific functor (e.g., ADDR "addressee") in Latin Vallex

title: Latin Wordnet - Specific synset in UDante and IT-TB
description: Finds all the lemmas belonging to a specific synset in UDante and IT-TB

title: Latin Vallex - Verbs with three functors
description: Find all the Verb with a sysnet with three functors

title: Tokens of "occido"
description: Given a lemma (e.g., "occido"), it retrieves all the tokens having that lemma in the works linked in the LiLa knowledge base

title: Affix "-in" in UDante and IT-TB
description: Given an affix (e.g., “in- (negative)”), it finds all the lemmas with such affix in UDante and IT-TB

title: Lemmas of a specific base in Dante and IT-TB
description: Given a lexical base (e.g., "loquor"), it finds all the lemmas belonging to the same lexical base in Dante and IT-TB

title: LatinAffectus - Sentiment in UDante
description: Retrieves the list of lemmas with a specific polarity in UDante

title: Nsubj and subj of "loquor" in UDante and IT-TB
description: Given a specific lemma (e.g., "loquor"), it retrieves all the lemmas that are annotated as nsubj in Dante and subj IT-TB
